title: Ticket #274: Enhance information about file transfer in job ad
description:
This is part of the large patch set contributed by Dan Forrest.

Dan's patch adds the following attributes to the job ad for vanilla jobs that use file transfer:

  • LastBytesRecvd
  • LastBytesSent
  • LastFilesRecvd
  • LastFilesSent

The LastBytes* pair are similar to the TotalBytes* pair we currently have. The LastFiles* pair rely on an enhancement to the file transfer object where it keeps track of the number of files sent as well the sum of their sizes.

Chunks from the annotated diff of Dan's changes (which Todd has) that are associated with this ticket are labeled with a (23).
